results.text: @UUID[Actor.W0YU4JM62fHhq4KJ]{The Scarlet Minotaur} (Area 18) stalks into sight, bellowing challenges and pawing the stone
[[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.fcgq7uwsJEMMdRNx]{Ettercaps} and [[/r 1d8]] @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.k8tAgECWIzPIStGU]{Beastmen} clash in a bloody melee
A dry gust of wind extinguishes all torches and lamps
[[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.fcgq7uwsJEMMdRNx]{Ettercaps} creep along, searching for gold and gems
The @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.cWzG0yEVgIk8ijk6]{Skeletons} of [[/r 1d6]] dead adventurers or warrior-mages stagger into sight
[[/r 2d4]] @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.k8tAgECWIzPIStGU]{Beastmen} argue in hushed whispers over who gets to eat the centipedes they just trapped in a bag
[[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.0JAEN5FsKjaXXZaA]{Darkmantles} swoop out, bobbing and spinning in a territorial warning dance
A @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.monster.j7sQ6Km2jSx5twCC]{Cave Creeper} rushes along the ceiling toward light
